page.title: 18LOCAL WILDLIFE
page.content: Here are some examples of wildlife in the area as spotted by local schoolchildren: {ANIMALS }Foxes, hedgehogs, stoats, weasels, a badger, Water rats, and town and field mice. {BIRDS }Blackbirds, thrushes, house sparrows, hedge sparrows, magpies, pidgeons (collar doves, wood, racing, house and white dovetail), sparrowhawks, robins, starlings, blue tits, longtailed tits and great tits. In recent years the wildlife in the area has decreased as more of the land is used up for building in the south east, and by noise pollution from the airport. The intensive farming to the west is also a disturbance to the numbers of birds and animals in the area.
